title: The last key shar
body: OK riot it has been ages since my last keyshard since i got my last key shard and currently i'm at 2 boxes and 1 keyshard ive been grinding but i can't get a single shard is this a bug or don't you have a system that increase the droprate of shard depending on games played (I.e ur drop rate of a shard is 7% then you play a game didnt get one it increases to 13% then 17% and it will continue untill you get your shard then it will get reseted to 7% again) at this rate i'm at 100%+

replies.body:
The droprate for key fragments is more of a curve than it is a line. So each time you earn a fragment, your chances of getting the next one goes down. This was designed to not penalize players who don't grind as hard from getting key fragments. This droprate resets about 30 days after the first key fragment you earned. 

For complete deets on this, check out our [Hextech Crafting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide). Let me know if you have any questions.
